pullRequest.title: DatagramDnsResponseDecoder should rethrow as CorruptedFrameException
pullRequest.bodyText:
Motivation:

DatagramDnsResponseDecoder should rethrow as CorruptedFrameException if an IndexOutOfBoundsException happens.

Modifications:

- Catch IndexOutOfBoundsException and rethrow as CorruptedFrameException
- Add a testcase

Result:

Less noise in the logs

nodes.bodyText: Dropped packets need to be released

commit.message:
DatagramDnsResponseDecoder should rethrow as CorruptedFrameException

Motivation:

DatagramDnsResponseDecoder should rethrow as CorruptedFrameException if an IndexOutOfBoundsException happens.

Modifications:

- Catch IndexOutOfBoundsException and rethrow as CorruptedFrameException
- Add a testcase

Result:

Less noise in the logs

beforeCommit.message:
DatagramDnsResponseDecoder should drop empty packets

Motivation:

DatagramDnsResponseDecoder should just ignore empty packets as we can't parse the id out of it anyway.

Modifications:

- Only try to decode if the packet has some content that is readable
- Add a testcase

Result:

Less noise in the logs
